description: The ex of Brazilian footballer Neymar looked sure to have a wardrobe malfunction as she appeared on the Ami G Show in a revealing playsuit.
title: Neymar's ex Soraja Vucelic's goes bullriding on TV show
title_page: Neymar's ex Soraja Vucelic's goes bullriding on TV show | Daily Mail Online
text:
An overzealous cameraman seemed very distracted by model Soraja Vucelic's cleavage as she rode an electric bull on a TV show.
The ex of Brazilian footballer Neymar looked sure to have a wardrobe malfunction as she appeared on the Ami G Show in a revealing playsuit.
And the camera operator appeared to linger a little too long on the Serbian model's figure during the stunt, bizarrely presented by a man in what appears to be a gimp mask.
An overzealous cameraman seemed very distracted by model Soraja Vucelic's cleavage as she rode an electric bull on a TV show
The ex of Brazilian footballer Neymar looked sure to have a wardrobe malfunction as she appeared on the Ami G Show in a revealing playsuit
And the camera operator appeared to linger a little too long on the Serbian model's figure during the stunt, bizarrely presented by a man in what appears to be a gimp mask
Despite the robot bull’s bucking, the 30-year-old didn't slip out of the outfit.
She landed decorously on the inflatable mat when she was eventually bucked off.
Soraja became famous while dating Barcelona footie ace Neymar Da Silva Santos, 24, back in 2014 after the pair met in Ibiza.
The Brazilian player kept the holiday romance alive by ordering a private jet to pick her up from her native Serbia to see him for a weekend in Spain.
Despite the robot bull’s bucking, the 30-year-old did not slip out of the outfit
She landed decorously on the inflatable mat when she was eventually bucked off
They later split despite his romantic gesture.
Vucelic first found fame on the country's equivalent of Big Brother.
This year, she was cut on the neck and stomach with a knife, allegedly by the ex-Red Star forward Stefan Mihajlovic, 21, after a party at his villa near Belgrade.
And a few weeks ago, Vucelic, who has also worked as a TV host, revealed that she fights a constant battle with anorexia and sometimes does not eat for days.
She dated Barcelona footie ace Neymar Da Silva Santos back in 2014 after they met on holiday in Ibiza
